body: Oh btw everytime he fcks the aunti something bad happens to his sisters hahaha
No not every man. Im hoping the uncle is somewhat good

That guy other guy in the study cafe is definetly going to try and rape the one in glasses. In these stories every man except the protagonist is a piece of shit. Also, I CAN FINALLY WRITE COMMENTS! FUCK YEAH
Ive gotten past the first sex scene. The word slutty is used to much. Just thought I should point that out but other than that it's great
the rape scene really made this whole series a turn off, it was good for the first 100 chapters then its just sluts fucking other ppl. 2/10

Sex scenes are cool and all but,
have u ever seen that CLEAN roundhouse kick to the neck before?? GODDAMN!
I'm still pretty new to webtoons, but this is one of the best I've seen so far. The art, plot, characters, scenes, everything is great.
